channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Vrouter to SL2L
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 5, 08:00 UTC  -  Feb 9, 20:00 UTC

Jan 11, 20:34 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Jan 11, 18:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/02/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 09/02/2024 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Zerto replication cut during the maintenance
Service improvement : Upgrade Vrouter to SL2L

item.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware Private Cloud
item.description:
Jan 18, 19:08 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/01/2024 14:27 UTC
End Time : 18/01/2024 14:32 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts in RBX7 experienced packet losses.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX7
Root cause : Network issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [SBG3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack S357B01/S357B02
item.description:
Jan 10, 22:52 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 10/01/2024 15:00 UTC
End Time : 10/01/2024 19:21 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jan 10, 19:21 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Servers in racks S357B01 and S357B02 are UP again since 10/01/2024 18:48 UTC.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.
